param.name: spacer
param.default: IMPORTANT: Only one of the following two options can be set to 'Yes'.
param.label: IMPORTANT
param.description: IMPORTANT: Only one of the following two options can be set to 'Yes'.

param.name: borderEffect
param.label: Border Effect
param.description: Select yes to use the border effect. IMPORTANT: If you select 'Yes', make sure option below is set to 'No'

param.name: noborderEffect
param.label: No Border Effect
param.description: Select yes to use the NO border effect. IMPORTANT: If you select 'Yes', make sure option above is set to 'No'

param.name: titleLink
param.label: Title Link
param.description: Type in full URL for Title Link (i.e. http://www.graphicaholic.com/joomla).

param.name: colorExterior
param.label: Outside border color
param.description: Outside border color (use the full HEX value). Type in [none] if using the No Border effect.

param.name: colorInterior
param.label: Inside module color
param.description: Inside container color (use the full HEX value).

param.name: height
param.label: Module's height
param.description: Module's height (Include the 'px' after your height value - Example: 300px)

param.name: width
param.label: Module's width
param.description: Module's width (Default is 'auto' so it will fill the entire width position automatically. Include the 'px' after your width value - Example: 300px)

param.name: pause
param.label: Pause on Mouseover
param.description: Pause the scrolling effect on mouseover?

param.name: time
param.label: Show Time-Stamp
param.description: Do you want to show the posting time-stamp?

param.name: bird
param.label: Twitter bird image?
param.description: Display Twitter bird image on outside border?
